questions.text: Was Leonardo DiCaprio in this movie?
options: He was only in a cameo
questions.explanation: Leonardo DiCaprio played Jack Dawson, the penniless artist who falls in love with Rose aboard the Titanic.

questions.text: What happened to Jack at the end of the movie?
options: He froze to death in the water
questions.explanation: Jack froze to death in the icy Atlantic Ocean, sacrificing his life to save Rose, who was the one who had to let him go.

questions.text: What was the Heart of the Ocean?
questions.explanation: The Heart of the Ocean was a rare blue diamond necklace given to Rose by her fiance Cal, which became one of the most valuable jewels ever lost at sea.

questions.text: Where did the real Titanic sink?
questions.explanation: The real Titanic sank in the North Atlantic Ocean off the coast of Newfoundland on April 15, 1912.

questions.text: What did Rose throw into the ocean at the end?
options: The Heart of the Ocean diamond
questions.explanation: Rose threw the Heart of the Ocean diamond into the ocean, symbolically returning to Jack and the Titanic after keeping it safe for 84 years.

questions.text: Was Ryan Gosling in this movie?
options: He was only in a cameo
questions.explanation: Ryan Gosling played Noah Calhoun, the romantic lumber worker who falls in love with Allie and writes her 365 letters.

questions.text: What happened to Allie at the end of the movie?
questions.explanation: Allie regained her memory temporarily after Noah read their story, but she forgot again and became upset, though she recognized Noah.

questions.text: How many letters did Noah write to Allie?
questions.explanation: Noah wrote Allie 365 letters, one for every day of the year, though her mother hid them from her.

questions.text: What was the house that Noah rebuilt called?
questions.explanation: Noah bought and restored the Windsor Plantation, the house Allie had always dreamed of living in.

questions.text: What was Allie's condition in the present day?
questions.explanation: Allie was suffering from dementia and living in a nursing home, where Noah read their story to help her remember.
